Class GL20Program

  • java.lang.Object

        • com.flowpowered.caustic.lwjgl.gl20.GL20Program

    GLVersioned

    public class GL20Program
extends Program
    An OpenGL 2.0 implementation of Program.

      • bindSampler

        public void bindSampler(int unit)
        Description copied from class: Program
        Binds the sampler to the texture unit. The binding is done according to the texture layout, which must be set in the program for the textures that will be used before any binding can be done.
        Specified by:
        bindSampler in class Program
        Parameters:
        unit - The unit to bind
